trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection" /> modules.
trans-unit.target: 配置 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection" /> 模块。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `add` element of the `httpModules` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction>类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改`add`元素`httpModules`配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> type is part of a group that includes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection>, collection, and the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection> types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction>类型是包括的组的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleActionCollection>，集合中，与<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModulesSection>类型。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `add` element of the `httpModules` section, which can also be accessed as members of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何以声明方式为的几个特性指定值`add`元素`httpModules`部分中，还可作为的成员访问<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction>类。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `httpModules` section.
trans-unit.target: 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`httpModules`部分。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the [NIB: How to: Create and Configure an HTTP Module](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4174fd13-a9c4-4ff6-baa5-3f7d7fc73ef3) to see how to build and configure an HTTP module.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[NIB： 如何： 创建和配置 HTTP 模块](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4174fd13-a9c4-4ff6-baa5-3f7d7fc73ef3)若要了解如何构建和配置 HTTP 模块。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> 类。

trans-unit.source: The module name.
trans-unit.target: 模块名。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list containing the module type name and the assembly information.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含模块类型名称和程序集信息的用逗号分隔的列表。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction" /> class using the passed parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用传递的参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The module name is an alias you can use to associate event handlers with the module events.
trans-unit.target: 模块名称是可用于将事件处理程序与模块事件相关联的别名。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET searches for the assembly DLL first in the application's private \bin directory and then in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC).
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 搜索程序集 DLL 首先在应用程序的专用的 \bin 目录中，然后在全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the module name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置模块名称。

trans-unit.source: The module name.
trans-unit.target: 模块名。

trans-unit.source: The module name is used to identify this <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction> object.
trans-unit.target: 模块名称用于标识此<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction.Name%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the module type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置模块类型。

trans-unit.source: A comma-separated list containing the module type name and the assembly information.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含模块类型名称和程序集信息的用逗号分隔的列表。

trans-unit.source: To find the assembly defined by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction.Type%2A>, ASP.NET searches for the assembly DLL first in the application's private \bin directory, and then in the system assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找由定义的程序集<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction.Type%2A>，ASP.NET 搜索程序集 DLL 首先在应用程序的专用的 \bin 目录中，然后在系统程序集缓存中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to access the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction.Type%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpModuleAction.Type%2A> 属性。
